content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

drop view if EXISTS bronze.view_payment_type go
create view bronze.view_payment_type
as 
select payment_type, payment_type_desc from 
    OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/payment_type.json',
         DATA_SOURCE = 'logical_DWH_exDS',
        format = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'

    )with(
        jsondata NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) 
    as json_paymenttype_data
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsondata) with (payment_type SMALLINT , payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15) ) go

select * from bronze.view_payment_type go
